      • LVQTC

        public LVQTC(PrototypeSet traDataSet,
             int it,
             double percProts,
             double alpha_r,
             double alpha_w,
             int T,
             int epoches)
        Constructor based on the training dataset and the parameters
        Parameters:
        traDataSet - Training data prototypes
        it - Number of iterations that will execute the algorithm.
        percProts - New size of the set (% of training data set).
        alpha_r - Alpha algorithm parameter.
        alpha_w - Alpha algorithm parameter.
        T - Retention threshold of the algorithm.
